> <OLD>
>
> Tucson prepares for whatever may happen by taking his sword in hand.
>
> He then looks to Big Convoy with a nodd of readiness.
>
> " I can see why you warned me, don't worry, I don't mind a challenge.  A
> challenge further sharpens the mind and perfects the skills."

<NEW>

BIG CONVOY nodded as the lift continued to move, its motion smooth and rapid.

LONG RACK and SHARP EDGE disappeared through the panel in the cieling
of the lift, first LONG RACK hoisted himself up with his crane-like
extendedable arm, and then he helped SHARP EDGE up as well.

As they closed the panel it left CONVOY, MACH KICK, BREAK and TUSCON
alone in the lift as it began to slow and then finally stop.

As the door slid open it revealed a long hall ahead of them as well as
one going in each direction left and right. From the looks of things
it was the prison level but this one was different, darker and older.

Two SHARKTICONS were standing at the door, thier optics wide with
surprise and even terror, it was obvious that they had intended to
take the lift themselves, unaware of the occupants.

Two blasts from CONVOY sent them slamming back and sliding across the
floor, thier chests smoking ruins, thier optics going black!

"Let's move!" He said as he stepped over the offline shells of the
SHARKTICONS and began to run down the hall.

(TAG)

Preston
